title: Motherwell NU2 Stadium
text:
NU 2 Stadium is a multi-use <a href="stadium">stadium</a> in <a href="Motherwell%2C%20Eastern%20Cape">Motherwell, Eastern Cape</a>, <a href="South%20Africa">South Africa</a>. It is currently used mostly for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches and is the home ground of <a href="Bay%20United%20F.C.">Bay Academy</a>.
Between January and February schools of Motherwell they go there to race. The school that has won the prizes it has to go with it."Riboh".
